issue.title: [R] arrow::write_parquet() code examples do not work
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7543](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7543). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The code examples in the docs for the R `arrow::write_parquet()` method are broken.

Fixed in PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6157

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7543?focusedCommentId=17012992) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6157
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6157>
